Quard International (Pvt) Ltd Colombo, Sri Lanka Closing Date: 16/02/2026 Job Ref No: 1463078 Full Time Print Freelance Graphic Designer Freelance Graphic Designer We are looking for a talented Freelance Graphic Designer to create engaging visual content for digital platforms. The role involves designing social media posts, marketing creatives, and other visual assets while maintaining brand consistency. Key Responsibilities Design social media posts, ads, and video thumbnails Create banners, posters, and marketing creatives Maintain visual consistency with brand guidelines Apply clean layouts, strong typography, and balanced color usage Ensure all designs meet quality and branding standards Suggest creative improvements when possible Skills Required Graphic Design: Photoshop / Illustrator / Canva (advanced) Strong understanding of social media formats Ability to manage tasks and deliver on time Basic motion graphics knowledge is a plus Responsibilities Deliver high-quality designs on agreed timelines Collaborate to maintain brand consistency across all visuals Provide creative input to improve design quality Apply Now: Please send your resume and portfolio link to hr@quardinternational.com Apply for jobs from your topjobs account create your personalised digital CV submit your CV with one click (no more uploading) track your job applications in one place Sign Up Login Having difficulty passing reCAPTCHA? ,

title: Software Engineer (Male)
description: × Seems you have change your Email address! Do you wish to update your email address in topjobs profile? Yes No Expired vacancy This vacancy has expired and currently you cannot apply to this job. Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Closing Date: 12/02/2026 Job Ref No: 1465035 Full Time Print Software Engineer (Male) Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd, (DMS) is a pioneering IT Company in Sri Lanka, now in its 49th year of business operations. While partnering the world’s leading IT Co’s, DMS specializes in Systems Integration and Customized Software Solutions for Sri Lankan and overseas markets DMS provides the excitement of working with the world’s leading IT brands, Financial solutions and learning from experienced managers and professionals in the IT industry. DMS represents the World’s leading American IT Co’s IBM, HP, Oracle, Microsoft, Diebold Nixdorf, Entrust-Datacard, Cisco and VMWare and has been the first to implement many cutting-edge technology solutions in Sri Lanka for over 48 years. The following vacancy currently exists in the Banking and Financial Systems Strategic Business Unit (SBU) of DMS. Vacancy: Software Engineer (Male) Applicants should be under 28 years of age and possess a Computer Science / Software degree from a recognized University / Institute and have a desire to pursue a career in Software Development and Support. Candidates for these positions should have: Working knowledge in C#, .NET Framework, Web Forms, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and PostgreSQL. A willingness to learn new things, and have the ability to Understand Programming Logic. Strong ability to reverse engineer code and the ability to read and understand code written by others. A good grasp of OOP design concepts and functional programming concepts.

title: Software Engineer (Male)
description: × Seems you have change your Email address! Do you wish to update your email address in topjobs profile? Yes No Expired vacancy This vacancy has expired and currently you cannot apply to this job. Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Closing Date: 12/02/2026 Job Ref No: 1465035 Full Time Print Software Engineer (Male) Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd, (DMS) is a pioneering IT Company in Sri Lanka, now in its 49th year of business operations. While partnering the world’s leading IT Co’s, DMS specializes in Systems Integration and Customized Software Solutions for Sri Lankan and overseas markets DMS provides the excitement of working with the world’s leading IT brands, Financial solutions and learning from experienced managers and professionals in the IT industry. DMS represents the World’s leading American IT Co’s IBM, HP, Oracle, Microsoft, Diebold Nixdorf, Entrust-Datacard, Cisco and VMWare and has been the first to implement many cutting-edge technology solutions in Sri Lanka for over 48 years. The following vacancy currently exists in the Banking and Financial Systems Strategic Business Unit (SBU) of DMS. Vacancy: Software Engineer (Male) Applicants should be under 28 years of age and possess a Computer Science / Software degree from a recognized University / Institute and have a desire to pursue a career in Software Development and Support. Candidates for these positions should have: Working knowledge in C#, .NET Framework, Web Forms, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and PostgreSQL. A willingness to learn new things, and have the ability to Understand Programming Logic. Strong ability to reverse engineer code and the ability to read and understand code written by others. A good grasp of OOP design concepts and functional programming concepts.

title: Software Engineer (Male)
description: × Seems you have change your Email address! Do you wish to update your email address in topjobs profile? Yes No Expired vacancy This vacancy has expired and currently you cannot apply to this job. Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Closing Date: 12/02/2026 Job Ref No: 1465035 Full Time Print Software Engineer (Male) Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd, (DMS) is a pioneering IT Company in Sri Lanka, now in its 49th year of business operations. While partnering the world’s leading IT Co’s, DMS specializes in Systems Integration and Customized Software Solutions for Sri Lankan and overseas markets DMS provides the excitement of working with the world’s leading IT brands, Financial solutions and learning from experienced managers and professionals in the IT industry. DMS represents the World’s leading American IT Co’s IBM, HP, Oracle, Microsoft, Diebold Nixdorf, Entrust-Datacard, Cisco and VMWare and has been the first to implement many cutting-edge technology solutions in Sri Lanka for over 48 years. The following vacancy currently exists in the Banking and Financial Systems Strategic Business Unit (SBU) of DMS. Vacancy: Software Engineer (Male) Applicants should be under 28 years of age and possess a Computer Science / Software degree from a recognized University / Institute and have a desire to pursue a career in Software Development and Support. Candidates for these positions should have: Working knowledge in C#, .NET Framework, Web Forms, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and PostgreSQL. A willingness to learn new things, and have the ability to Understand Programming Logic. Strong ability to reverse engineer code and the ability to read and understand code written by others. A good grasp of OOP design concepts and functional programming concepts.

title: Software Engineer (Male)
description: × Seems you have change your Email address! Do you wish to update your email address in topjobs profile? Yes No Expired vacancy This vacancy has expired and currently you cannot apply to this job. Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Closing Date: 12/02/2026 Job Ref No: 1465035 Full Time Print Software Engineer (Male) Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd, (DMS) is a pioneering IT Company in Sri Lanka, now in its 49th year of business operations. While partnering the world’s leading IT Co’s, DMS specializes in Systems Integration and Customized Software Solutions for Sri Lankan and overseas markets DMS provides the excitement of working with the world’s leading IT brands, Financial solutions and learning from experienced managers and professionals in the IT industry. DMS represents the World’s leading American IT Co’s IBM, HP, Oracle, Microsoft, Diebold Nixdorf, Entrust-Datacard, Cisco and VMWare and has been the first to implement many cutting-edge technology solutions in Sri Lanka for over 48 years. The following vacancy currently exists in the Banking and Financial Systems Strategic Business Unit (SBU) of DMS. Vacancy: Software Engineer (Male) Applicants should be under 28 years of age and possess a Computer Science / Software degree from a recognized University / Institute and have a desire to pursue a career in Software Development and Support. Candidates for these positions should have: Working knowledge in C#, .NET Framework, Web Forms, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and PostgreSQL. A willingness to learn new things, and have the ability to Understand Programming Logic. Strong ability to reverse engineer code and the ability to read and understand code written by others. A good grasp of OOP design concepts and functional programming concepts.

title: Software Engineer (Male)
description: × Seems you have change your Email address! Do you wish to update your email address in topjobs profile? Yes No Expired vacancy This vacancy has expired and currently you cannot apply to this job. Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Closing Date: 12/02/2026 Job Ref No: 1465035 Full Time Print Software Engineer (Male) Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd Data Management Systems (Pvt) Ltd, (DMS) is a pioneering IT Company in Sri Lanka, now in its 49th year of business operations. While partnering the world’s leading IT Co’s, DMS specializes in Systems Integration and Customized Software Solutions for Sri Lankan and overseas markets DMS provides the excitement of working with the world’s leading IT brands, Financial solutions and learning from experienced managers and professionals in the IT industry. DMS represents the World’s leading American IT Co’s IBM, HP, Oracle, Microsoft, Diebold Nixdorf, Entrust-Datacard, Cisco and VMWare and has been the first to implement many cutting-edge technology solutions in Sri Lanka for over 48 years. The following vacancy currently exists in the Banking and Financial Systems Strategic Business Unit (SBU) of DMS. Vacancy: Software Engineer (Male) Applicants should be under 28 years of age and possess a Computer Science / Software degree from a recognized University / Institute and have a desire to pursue a career in Software Development and Support. Candidates for these positions should have: Working knowledge in C#, .NET Framework, Web Forms, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 and PostgreSQL. A willingness to learn new things, and have the ability to Understand Programming Logic. Strong ability to reverse engineer code and the ability to read and understand code written by others. A good grasp of OOP design concepts and functional programming concepts.
